lines: Welcome to the Hard Place, owned and operated by the illustrious Adkiragh. Whether you've come to partake in the finest fare our realm has to offer, or merely to take in the opulent ambience, you've clearly chosen the perfect destination.

Your bemused expression does not escape me. “Whatever is he wearing on his head?” Your mind boggles─and with good reason, for my entrepreneurial genius exists on a plane beyond the comprehension of lesser minds.
I ask you, what is more important to a businessman than attracting the eye of his potential customers? I have attracted your eye, have I not? Consider yourself enlightened.
What's that? You wonder if I am an Adarkim?
Hahaha! Y-You are quite a comedian. No, no, I am just a regular piggy. Even if I were an Adarkim─which I'm not─I wouldn't dream of trying to become the next khan.
Someone with such dreams would be putting their very life at risk! Adarkim males will do anything to become khan─or so I hear. Now be off with you! Here, have some buuz for the road.

obj.n: Doublet de soigneur en ramie sanctifiée
Gants de soigneur en cuir de dragon
Grègues de soigneur en ramie sanctifiée
